img_text: Slave Stomp' ahead No activities are planned for this weekend, but HUMP workers are busy selling tickets for the Mississippi Slave Stomp" slated for Saturday night, Feb, 28, at the Washington Hilton Ho- tel, Stars such as Donne Hatha- way, "Frankie and the Spin- dells", and Chuck Jackson, have agreed to perform at the gala dance. In keeping with the slavery-days theme, guests are to come dressed as either field hunds or house servants.
